question: How many referrals were reported per hour from Friday to 0600hrs Monday in the force area?
sql:
WITH HourlyReferrals AS (
  SELECT 
    CONVERT(DATE, ReferralCreatedDateTime) AS ReferralDate,
    DATEPART(HOUR, ReferralCreatedDateTime) AS ReferralHour,
    COUNT(*) AS NumberOfReferrals
  FROM Referrals 
  WHERE 
    ReferralCreatedDateTime >= '2023-10-01' AND
    ReferralCreatedDateTime < '2023-10-06'
  GROUP BY CONVERT(DATE, ReferralCreatedDateTime), DATEPART(HOUR, ReferralCreatedDateTime)
)
SELECT
  ReferralDate,
  ReferralHour,
  NumberOfReferrals
FROM HourlyReferrals
ORDER BY ReferralDate, ReferralHour;

    DATEPART(HOUR, ReferralCreatedDateTime) AS ReferralHour,
    COUNT(*) AS NumberOfReferrals
  FROM Referrals 
  WHERE 
    ReferralCreatedDateTime >= '2023-10-01' AND
    ReferralCreatedDateTime < '2023-10-06'
  GROUP BY CONVERT(DATE, ReferralCreatedDateTime), DATEPART(HOUR, ReferralCreatedDateTime)
)
SELECT
  ReferralDate,
  ReferralHour,
  NumberOfReferrals
FROM HourlyReferrals
ORDER BY ReferralDate, ReferralHour;
